oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: A young woman of the Early Race is carried off by the Rain in the form of a bull. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
7448). The Rain courted a young woman of the Early Race, because of her scent. The young woman climbs onto the Rain's back and he starts to take her away to his home (the water
pit). The young woman rubs buchu on the Rain, which makes him fall asleep and she steals away from the Rain and returns home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A young woman of the Early Race of people carried off by the Rain, in the shape of a bull
